TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit GeofenceHardware extends Java.Lang.Object

Docs.summary: This class handles geofences managed by various hardware subsystems.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: public bool AddGeofence (int geofenceId, Android.Hardware.Location.GeofenceMonitoringType monitoringType, Android.Hardware.Location.GeofenceHardwareRequest? geofenceRequest, Android.Hardware.Location.GeofenceHardwareCallback? callback);

.method public hidebysig instance bool AddGeofence(int32 geofenceId, valuetype Android.Hardware.Location.GeofenceMonitoringType monitoringType, class Android.Hardware.Location.GeofenceHardwareRequest geofenceRequest, class Android.Hardware.Location.GeofenceHardwareCallback callback) cil managed

Docs.param: The id associated with the geofence.
The type of the hardware subsystem that should be used to monitor the geofence.
The GeofenceHardwareRequest object associated with the geofence.
GeofenceHardwareCallback that will be use to notify the transition.
Docs.summary: Creates a circular geofence which is monitored by subsystems in the hardware.
Docs.returns: true when the geofence is successfully sent to the hardware for addition.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.exception: when the geofence request type is not supported.

Docs.summary: The constant to indicate that the user has entered the geofence.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance int32[] GetMonitoringTypes() cil managed

Docs.summary: Returns all the hardware geofence monitoring systems which are supported
Docs.returns: An array of all the monitoring types. An array of length 0 is returned in case of errors.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance bool PauseGeofence(int32 geofenceId, valuetype Android.Hardware.Location.GeofenceMonitoringType monitoringType) cil managed

Docs.param: The type of the hardware subsystem that should be used to monitor the geofence.
Docs.summary: Pauses the monitoring of a geofence added by #addGeofence call.
Docs.returns: true when the geofence is successfully sent to the hardware for pausing.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Register the callback to be notified when the state of a hardware geofence monitoring system changes.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance bool RemoveGeofence(int32 geofenceId, valuetype Android.Hardware.Location.GeofenceMonitoringType monitoringType) cil managed

Docs.param: The type of the hardware subsystem that should be used to monitor the geofence.
Docs.summary: Removes a geofence added by #addGeofence call.
Docs.returns: true when the geofence is successfully sent to the hardware for removal. .

MemberSignature.Value: public bool ResumeGeofence (int geofenceId, Android.Hardware.Location.GeofenceMonitoringType monitoringType, Android.Hardware.Location.GeofenceTransition monitorTransition);

.method public hidebysig instance bool ResumeGeofence(int32 geofenceId, valuetype Android.Hardware.Location.GeofenceMonitoringType monitoringType, valuetype Android.Hardware.Location.GeofenceTransition monitorTransition) cil managed

Docs.param: The type of the hardware subsystem that should be used to monitor the geofence.
Docs.summary: Resumes the monitoring of a geofence added by #pauseGeofence call.
Docs.returns: true when the geofence is successfully sent to the hardware for resumption.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance bool UnregisterForMonitorStateChangeCallback(valuetype Android.Hardware.Location.GeofenceMonitoringType monitoringType, class Android.Hardware.Location.GeofenceHardwareMonitorCallback callback) cil managed

Docs.summary: Unregister the callback that was used with #registerForMonitorStateChangeCallback to notify when the state of the hardware geofence monitoring system changes.
